website_summaries.verdict: Higher-end set improves game play with recessed tile holders, a rotating board, and convenient storage for trays and letters. Ideal gift for serious Scrabble enthusiasts.
pros: Tiles remain in place while table is turned
Lazy Susan turntable replaced by better wheels
Curved letter racks improve player privacy during game
cons: Some tiles are offset, missing number values
Game board design different than classic version

customer_reviews.title: I would expect it to be better quality.
customer_reviews.text: The tiles were not uniform and letters all over the place. The board is defective. I wrote a complaint to Hasbro and they claimed this product is no longer in production and wondered if I purchased from a third party. With paying a premium price, I would expect it to be better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the Scrabble Deluxe Edition Game (Amazon Exclusive)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hate this scrabble deluxe edition game.This scrabble is cheaply built, split away during games. Plus you have to lug around a big box. Tell me Hasbro, this newer deluxe is far worst than the previous and how come you cant store the items inside the other Scrabble deluxe. This Scrabble Deluxe is failure. Go back to the previous version. I had purchased the Scrabble Deluxe Edition Game (Amazon Exclusive) in December , Amazon please bring back Scrabble Deluxe Edition Game (Amazon Exclusive) which was better. You could store all everything inside the bottom of the game. And clean up was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend purchasing another version with a lazy-Susan type of revolving ...
customer_reviews.text: The playing surface is made of two pieces of molded plastic that connect with two pull-out plastic hinges. When you turn the board so your opposing player can see the letters, the board comes apart all the time and you have to fix it. The design defeats the purpose of buying this version of the game. I would recommend purchasing another version with a lazy-Susan type of revolving mechanism. The game itself is a classic, but this particular version of it is annoying to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

customer_reviews.title: the board itself is not a good quality nor are the tiles
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I was expecting for the price, but I would not refer to this as "deluxe". I already had a deluxe board and tiles, and was looking for a more transportable set. While the ridges on the board hold the tiles, the board itself is not a good quality nor are the tiles. there doesn't appear to be much quality control in printing and cutting the tiles. The letters were not always the same color tone nor were the letters centered in the tile. I gave it to a friend, as she has children that are learning to play the game. It is not a set that will last a long time if used frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Martha L. McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this game and the quality of the board is very good. Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LizzyBoredom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing way it is put together. I have an ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing way it is put together. I have an older version of the "Scrabble Deluxe Edition which is one molded piece of plastic that you just open up. This one, when you open it, the board is in two pieces that often comes apart or sticks up in one place. This has been "dumbed down" in assembly excepting for the price. I would not get another one.
customer_reviews.author: LindaFaith

customer_reviews.title: The "carrying case" is a handle attached to the game's cardboard box.
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is fine. However, I bought it because the product listing said it came with a carrying case and my plan was to store the game in the carrying case aboard my sailboat for rainy day or evening fun in the cabin. Once I received the game, I realized they just attached a handle to the top of the game box then called it a carrying case. Had I known the case was just a cardboard box (which is not a good way to store things aboard a boat, for obvious reasons), I would not have bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: the craftsmanship is incredibly poor. It's clear Hasbro really reduced quality in order ...
customer_reviews.text: This edition is in no way deluxe, the craftsmanship is incredibly poor. It's clear Hasbro really reduced quality in order to increase profits, the older versions of the game have much better tiles, a board that is more sturdy with an actual hinge and handle, and nice amenities like little drawers to hold your tiles and racks. Even the printing on the board is low-quality, with many smudges in the ink. Hasbro should be ashamed and embarrassed to sell something this low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deathly_Hallows

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe-o Oh No! Not entirely what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The letter tiles are made of wood; however, the tile holders are light, bendable plastic. These cheap-o tile holders are not depicted on the cover of the box which I later deemed deceptive. Your letters can easily be knocked off the plastic rack due to the lack of weight. There goes your game plan. For the money, I think the tile holders should be made out of wood as they used to be and as you might expect. I would keep the game if wooden tile holder replacements were provided and I were allowed to simply throw the nasty plastic ones away without having to go to the PO to return them during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Caifornia Central Coast

customer_reviews.title: Overprice and misleading presentation
customer_reviews.text: What a disapointment on this product. I am returning it. There is nothing of Deluxe about this product: Tiles are non uniform in size and printing is so off from the centre that seems to be made for a prototype!!! The joint betwen the two sections is too lack of engineering design that is just a shame. There were some good references / reviews for this products; so, I took the chance, but I think those were from the designers or the very same vendors. I realistic price for this item in a school rifle would be $8. That may be a rip off though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: This is a toy version of scrabble!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this game less than one star. I bought this game as a travel game and was surprised when I got it that the case was as bulky as it was. So, I made a fabric bag to hold all of the components. I didn’t examine the game when I first got it but I was so disappointed in EVERY component when I sat down tonight to play for the first time. The tiles are cheap and the printing is in no way uniform. The clips to hold the two halves of the board together are completely ineffective and the tile racks are not level. This is a giant waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: David P. McAdoo

customer_reviews.title: The construction of the game was far under par to what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: For the price that I paid for this Scrabble game I expected far better. I guess in today’s standards it’s to be expected but I remember the one my mother had which the board was a sturdy cardboard the tile holders were wooden and the tiles were a finished tile. This one has a decent board kind of flimsy the tile holders are very thin plastic and the wooden tiles are just cut pieces of wood not finished at all. I would not buy this again as a gift myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kelley Davis

customer_reviews.title: good features for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I had a REALLY nice Scrabble set I bought years ago, board made of wood and on a turntable. I say had because I lost it when our home flooded from tropical storm Harvey. I wanted another one that could be rotated, but unwilling to pay well over $100 for one. So this one is the next best thing. And it has ridges that keep the letters in place too. Nice set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M. Richard

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great version for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mother-in-law. I like the price point, the grid lines for the tiles and the rotating board. My only real issue was that there was a lack of uniformity in the title size. 1 or 2 of them were shorter than the others. Not a huge deal except that it bothered my OCD and, if there are only a couple, it tips your hand to the other players because they can figure out what tile it could be if they've played with you before.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Eh.  Ok, but not great!
customer_reviews.text: Divorced a few years ago and she took the Scrabble game. Yeah, I know....but at least I got the dog! It was a solidly-made, turntable board. I've searched for a suitable replacement, and found this. Priced as a deluxe game, I expected it to be very similar. Not even close. This is cheap plastic and the board is two pieces that click together. She can have the dog, I want that game back!
customer_reviews.author: RobS

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately was able to return for full refund
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this. It was SOOOO cheaply made. The board wouldn't even fit together as much as we tried. Fortunately was able to return for full refund. Very very plasticy.
customer_reviews.author: Pawster

customer_reviews.title: Previous edition much better! Buy older edition on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Board comes in 2 pieces that do not securely fit together. Does not come with hard case for travel like the previous edition. I'm returning this edition and puchasing the previous edition which is still sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Mama

customer_reviews.title: Smehh
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this is just exactly what I was not looking for, the tiles fit nicely but the feel of the board is just so cheap. If you want to use this board frequently it's just not worth it because the board does not snap together and stay as one piece for very long. I dont wan't to spend over $100, but this feels like a durable cheap board. I'm looking for something more permanent, I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but far from good
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed in the quality. Considering it is the ‘deluxe’ edition, it leaves a bit to be desired. Overall build quality is low.. the plastic is flimsy and the wooden tiles are of greatly varied quality. My mother has a version with a proper swivel base and better quality material from the 80s. Not bad, but far from good.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product. It swivels and that’s what I was looking for, however, the board has to be put together. It comes in two halves that you put together but they do NOT lock in. As a result when your playing the game and turning it, it comes apart. This is extremely annoying. Outside of that I’d say it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Angela browne

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: This game is a piece of junk. No part of it is deluxe. The plastic is cheap and thin. The print on the letters isn’t even centered. The “carrying case” is the the cardboard box it came in that has a handle. I can’t believe they are selling this garbage for $50. It should be $10. Still wouldn’t t buy it at that price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Clark

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, does not stay together.
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. The board does NOT stay together. It was advertised as the "newer model". Its terrible. But the Deluxe one with the drawers. This one is going back!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, simple, lightweight, colorful
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of assembly yet the board tends to separate on one end if not careful. Also the letter holders are a light plastic prefer a little heavier or wooden. The case is cardboard with handle but sturdy. Prefer a tin case instead for fear of it wearing out sooner. Otherwise it’s a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: GEM1

customer_reviews.title: Great Scrabble board
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! The turntable glides nicely to turn to each player. The game board itself has indentions for the tiles so they don’t move around like the traditional board. The only complaint I have is that we had to order 3 times to get a box that wasn’t smashed (shipping box was in perfect condition).
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, board comes in halves, wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Board sucks...comes in two halves and it rests on a little hook-like clip but doesn’t even secure. Rolls nicely but if you’re not careful it comes unhooked. Not sure if I’m doing something wrong but it’s not ideal and the letters aren’t even wood...they’re plastic with printed letters (not engraved like the old days) with cheap little plastic letter holders. Not worth the money if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: ThatsWhatSheSaid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent layout!
customer_reviews.text: Like very much the "Deluxe" version; big, clear board, nice ridges to "lock in" pieces. All in all, good value for the board quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Great features and price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the beat versions of Scrabble you will find, don’t bother with the expensive “Deluxe” edition it’s way overpriced and cheaply made. This one is great value and not a bad price and has excellent features
customer_reviews.author: Tony T-Bone

customer_reviews.title: Not like the "old" Deluxe Set
customer_reviews.text: I remember the older version of "deluxe scrabble" and this sure isn't it. It doesn't have a base to swivel on (but it does rotate ok if you're on a hard surface) and the letter tiles are low quality. They are lightweight and seem cheap. Not like the older ones -- which I remember being smooth, glossy, heavy, and rounded at the edges. This will certainly work, but I'm disappointed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: A good version of scrabble
customer_reviews.text: Made for ease of access, the rotating board, but otherwise not any different from other versions of scrabble. Only downside is putting it back in the box which can be a little bit of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Jarnagin

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought I was getting...
customer_reviews.text: Instead of the deluxe version with the lazy susan, this is a weird design where the board splits in half and has wheels underneath. I was also disappointed in the "cheap-looking" quality of the letters (not varnished, inconsistent sizing) and the cheap plastic tile holders instead of the wooden ones most sets come with.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Faller

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pieces, including the board itself is terrible! The plastic is thin and cheap, the board doesn't hold together well and the printing on the tiles themselves is uneven and even the font is inconsistent. I am extremely disappointed and angry at having paid for this product! The best part about it is the carrier box, and the fact that the tiles actually fit into the squares on the board. It's definitely an embarrassing gift to give anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. The board rotates and translates easily. Unlike the original flat board that allowed the tiles to migrate about when you bump it, this board has molded recesses that hold each tile perfectly. It makes it more difficult to put the tiles away at the end of the game, but it's worth it. Love it. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: TestingGuy007

customer_reviews.title: not the game or board expected
customer_reviews.text: I have a Scrabble Deluxe game made by winning moves and I thought when looking it closing on line the 4 corners scored quadruple points which my game has. I wanted to get one just like it for a relative and was disappointed that the one that came only got triple points for the 4 corners. The one I got from Amazon seems to be put out by Hasbro and isn't as much fun as the one I have with 441 spaces and 200 wood tiles. So was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Please do not mention my name

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement on a old pastime game
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good edition of an old game. The board keeps the tiles neat on the playing field. The board moves effortlessly for players to play. The case is made of cardboard and would need reinforcing to last for some time.
customer_reviews.author: 49er

customer_reviews.title: Grids help keep tiles in place.
customer_reviews.text: We love the grids. And the tiles. However it is difficult to turn on a card table sized table. I am in a group who plays weekly for 2 to 4 hours. We all have drinks and snacks on the table as well as a score pad. Please reduce the width of the board.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Scrabble, enough said!
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever for all ages. Get your mind thinking and the best way to pass time with family. I most enjoy coming up with new words, keeps my peeps on their toes. This deluxe version can turn so your able to really see the board. Worth every penny I spent. Timeless game for all to play. Once again, Scrabble, enough said!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Morris

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst board I've ever played on
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst board I've ever played on. For being "deluxe" it sure feels cheap and it bends in the middle so if the surface you're playing on is even slightly uneven you run the risk of the board splitting mid-game.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Favorite game
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite games. This addition has the rotation assist with a turntable. Plastic squares keep letters in place. Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moering

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that this scrabble game is compact but ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this scrabble game is compact but when I ordered this one it looked like the one I ordered last year that fold up and is it’s own carrying case. This one is in two pieces that doesn’t stay connected when turning and the paper box is its carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Marvalous

customer_reviews.title: for the price wasn't really happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: for the price wasn't really happy with the quality.. it comes in 2 halfs which come apart very easy. the grooves that hold the letters are vert shallow and work so so.. the word holders are just cheap plastic, it came with no score pad.. i remember when i was a kid i got a really nice all wooden scrabble game and for less money.. nowadays they just produce cheap plastic remakes and the price is higher for profit i guess. stinks.
customer_reviews.author: erock

customer_reviews.title: Old game in updated form
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Got for my 9 year old grandson and we’re enjoying it several times a week. Plan on taking a cross country trip via train this summer and we’ll be taking this along!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - Nothing Deluxe About It
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap plastic set. The board comes in two parts and has to be assembled each time. Ugly. Returned without playing.
customer_reviews.author: BostonDelia

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this game. I really like how the rotation mechanism allows for each player to adjust the board during their turn. Besides going in a 360 point turn, it can also shift up and down. Our table is rectangle and narrow but we haven't had any issues with rotating and moving the board. This is a high quality board that I can see lasting a very long time in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Nei Antunes dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scrabble set. The family loves this and I’m sure will get many years of fun from this!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: One of the timeless games --
customer_reviews.text: A great game to sharpen your English word skills and be fun and entertaining at the same time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Cyd

customer_reviews.title: Needs more durable box
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy scrabble as a family. I bought this one thinking it would be easier for the kids to pack away and while us the box isn’t very durable.
customer_reviews.author: PHILIP S.

customer_reviews.title: Wooden tile holders a thing of the past
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this item, I assumed that the tile holders would be the traditional wooden trays. To my disappointment, they are a cheap plastic tray. In addition, the letter tiles are thinner than in previous editions. The tray rotates as advertised, and the board is easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: but this is a great scrabble board for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant getting this based on reviews, but this is a great scrabble board for the price. You can't expect it to be like the $150 versions. The tiles stay in place and it swivels around just fine. It's great for the common scrabble player.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this board! The prices stay on place the board folds in half to help store and also comes with its own travel case! Perfect for scrabble players
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This gift is for my son for Christmas. I was expecting a little better Deluxe Scrabble board but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Folk Myth Magic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift that sparked a great deal of envy! Wound up referring several friends to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Poor 'turntable' quality--wheels
customer_reviews.text: Not deluxe in the least! Letters not consistently aligned on the tiles. Poor 'turntable' quality--wheels, really? No hourglass. No notepad and pencil. How is this deluxe? Because the tiles stay put on the board?
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: the nice parts: the pieces have places to "sit" in. The two piece gaming table swivels around. the not so nice part: when turning the gaming table, it tends to detach from the other half very easily. Would be WAY better if it would "lock" into place for gaming
customer_reviews.author: ScoutMomof4

customer_reviews.title: Love scrabble
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play, great family game, love the fact game board can be turned to each player
customer_reviews.author: Mrsno

customer_reviews.title: Does not come as pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not come as pictured. It say it has a carrying case but it’s actually the box it comes in. In the description there is a blue carrying case but does not come with it! The box was actually damaged and moldy!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Lyttle

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love to play Scrabble with a group of friends and this has made so much more fun with a board that rotates. Great purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's okay only in the sense that you can play the Scrabble game with it--however, advertised as "deluxe" I expected more. All plastic board and pieces, nothing remarkable or deluxe about it, certainly not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kptmrgn

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Did not like, the playing board is in 2 parts and you need to click them together, after you do that it is hard to get both sides to lie flat and even. The carrying case is cardboard, not very durable. Had the older version of the Deluxe Scrabble and it is much nicer and better, everything is stored in the foldable game and it is much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: AWILDA M. RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Wood tiles are not engraved like older versions. Storage box is cheap cardboard and handle broke first time it was used. Plastic tile holders are super crappy. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Hoak

customer_reviews.title: Fine Scrabble board
customer_reviews.text: This board is nice and I am glad I bought it. That said, some of the letters are cut in diagonal lines so they are not identical squares. The board also does not full hook together, two notches on the bottom just sit together in a groove to hold the board together which is a bit annoying if you are playing on an uneven surface like a couch.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew r.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Racks that hold letters are way too small. Otherwise a good item
customer_reviews.author: Mosaic Marketing

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gift or game night
customer_reviews.text: Good one for a gift or family to use for game night I purchased one for my mother-in-law for Christmas and she loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdaddy_Inc

customer_reviews.title: get the one that rotates like this one
customer_reviews.text: if you want to buy a scrabble game, get the one that rotates like this one, and order extra wood letters. One game lasts about an hour with two players. We taught my husband how to play - he is not a board game player but now he asks us to play with him. it is perfect for ages 8 and up, or a gift for grandparents tp play with grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: chick517

customer_reviews.title: It as a plastic board.
customer_reviews.text: Can play the game but the board has to hook together in the middle and it keeps coming apart during the game.
customer_reviews.author: Augretta T.

customer_reviews.title: Best Scrabble set I’ve seen..& reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Scrabble set! Grooves for the tiles so no sliding. Spins to face player. Board comes apart in the middle for easy storage Cardboard suitcase type box does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Litter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not a very nice set. The tiles are light weight and the letters are faded. The board does not rotate well. The board also is not connected, and the carry box is just a cardboard box with a handle. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: We love Scrabble!
customer_reviews.text: The turning board is SO worth the extra $. We love Scrabble night at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: It's less what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have the old edition from 20 years it's much better than this. It's bigger, one piece, the wooden pieces perfectly printed. This one is two pieces that keeps separating from each other they don't securely lock, the wooden pieces for the litters printed not on one level,even the box is cheep.
customer_reviews.author: Mb

customer_reviews.title: Turns very easily by the way
customer_reviews.text: got this to play while camping with hubby. He loves the fact that the letter's stay put when one turns the board for the next person to read. Turns very easily by the way. The negative on this is ........its so darn big on the "ends", that one has to move their letter rack way out of the way to turn the board. Kinda bulky in other words.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger M. Snaps

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a Christmas gift and was disappointed when I actually saw the game
customer_reviews.text: Wishing I had read the description better~ This comes in two pieces and hooks together. It is very flimsy and not very handy. I bought this as a Christmas gift and was disappointed when I actually saw the game. Thought I was buying something else, as I have a Scrabble game that rotates and is actually a case for all of the pieces, one unit that folds in half with hinges. After going back and reading the description it does say it is in two pieces...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: clerk design but quite flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ability to easily rotate this scrabble board, but I was disappointed in the craftsmanship and general flimsy feel. the sides kept coming apart, as well. Overall, a good design idea, but poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L. Lief

customer_reviews.title: GAME NIGHT WITH THE GIRLS
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I love the case (box) in comes in, easy to carry when I sleepover my mom's.
customer_reviews.author: JENNYNYC

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Tiles stay in place, folds up easy, great for the grandkids instead of TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pieces stayed in place. Reasonable price and good carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Game is fun for the whole family. It’s a good but.
customer_reviews.text: We love Scrabble so this game is really nice. We play everyday and it builds up your vocabulary. I think they should’ve thought out the idea of putting it together better that’s all.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonzo

customer_reviews.title: Love it  easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use My husband HAS Parkinsons disease and he can easily manage the tiles
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: Great scrabble game especially for the price....tiles fit and stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nothing about this is "Deluxe"
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, tiles are some sort of plastic that looks like wood. Board is flimsy and two pieces that seperate if you're not careful. In a word...disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Pruchinsky

customer_reviews.title: There was once another deluxe scrabble game that came with a drawer and better carrying case other than a box
customer_reviews.text: I thought it had a drawer in it to store the tiles. There was once another deluxe scrabble game that came with a drawer and better carrying case other than a box, so we were rather disappointed when we unveiled this scrabble game. I guess the better quality game is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a very nice board, I like that it rolls
customer_reviews.text: It has a very nice board, I like that it rolls. However there were a couple things I did not like, some of the tiles were uneven and there was no two letter word booklet which my family is so used to.
customer_reviews.author: R B.

customer_reviews.title: Too cheesy, too bulky. Not luxury at all
customer_reviews.text: Cheesy materials. Our old set had nice wooden letter holders and letters. The so-called”luxury” set has cheap plastic holders and thinner letters. Bigger size not handy.
customer_reviews.author: barbara walters

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful game and we love the feature of the tiles staying where they are played.
customer_reviews.author: lorna ballein

customer_reviews.title: Love this version!!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I absolutely love this version of Scrabble.
customer_reviews.author: Sythe

customer_reviews.title: Not the scrabble you remember. Junk
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this game. Was looking forward to nights of playing the game i loved as a kid with my wife but the board doesn't stay together, and the letters are so cheap several are not even cut straight. For this price I expected SOOOO much more.
customer_reviews.author: Robi michalek

customer_reviews.title: Scrabble Deluxe
customer_reviews.text: Not scrabble deluxe but playable. Switching from player to player is great. Cards to keep score not included you have to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Simonian

customer_reviews.title: Love the game itself
customer_reviews.text: The board does not stay connected (two halves). Also, the letter holders are dollar store quality. Love the game itself, Hasbro should be making it better over the years, not trying to cut corners.
customer_reviews.author: Laureen

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy the scrabble game that folds up, but does not come apart!
customer_reviews.text: This game board comes apart easily, the letters are very cheaply made, and there is no two letter word summary sheet in the instruction booklet, as there is in other scrabble games. The carrying case is nice, but does not make up for the aforementioned deficiencies.
customer_reviews.author: laurelleigh

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I play scrabble constantly. The rotating table makes it easy to use. Was disappointed in the tiles. Some were chipped and faded.
customer_reviews.author: Dom R

customer_reviews.title: This deluxe scrabble is not as nice as the older deluxe version.
customer_reviews.text: The board rotates and keeps tiles in place. I was disappointed the tile racks were plastic and not wooden. Also the tiles are not imprinted with the letters. There is no score sheets. Just was not as "deluxe" as the old sets.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Busche

customer_reviews.title: We quit playing when it detatched at every turn
customer_reviews.text: 2 pieces come apart when you try to turn it. Solution of don't move it works, but the price was for a travel one. Only on a flat surface....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I could not locate this Deluxe Version at the stores. Great gift, the recipient really enjoyed the turntable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Craw

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for us
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for us, spins and stays together nicely on a flat surface. Tiles are perfectly cut but fit fine in the slots.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cuomo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All sorts of letters, and yes, quartzy is a word. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosco

customer_reviews.title: Great board game
customer_reviews.text: Great board game. The wheels and mobility are a plus over a standard scrabble board. Everyone gets an equal view of the playing surface.
customer_reviews.author: Russell DeFranco

customer_reviews.title: LOVE SCRABBLE
customer_reviews.text: Spinning board makes the game easy, no more spilling tiles
customer_reviews.author: Gotta Have It

customer_reviews.title: but the wood is pretty chincy. The board is pretty convenient to rotate ...
customer_reviews.text: The tiles are wood, but the wood is pretty chincy. The board is pretty convenient to rotate though.
customer_reviews.author: MHP1969

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As expected. However board on wheels not on swivel as first thought. Still, a great product not found in this version in NZ.
customer_reviews.author: Swoop65

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this game and that it rotates. The carrying case will crumble over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Classic game from my childhood that I now enjoy playing with my own kids!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Hope your box is not crushed.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it due to the box was crush and now the new one is crushed in the corner as well. Not happy returning it again wasting my time and it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: mary washington

product_meta.title: Scrabble Deluxe Edition Game
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingIt’s the classic game of Scrabble with Deluxe features! You can take your game to the next level with this Deluxe Edition game. The wheeled gameboard turns so nobody has to read the board upside down, and its non-slip grid keeps the tiles in place. When the game is over, you can store it in the handy carry case! Get ready to word up with Deluxe Edition Scrabble! Scrabble and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.

BRAND STORY
By Hasbro Games
feature_bullets: Scrabble deluxe edition game is the classic game with new features
Wheeled game board turns to each player
Scrabble Deluxe Edition game is the classic game with new features
Wheeled gameboard turns to each player
Non-slip grid keeps tiles in place
Deluxe carry case for easy storage
Includes wheeled gameboard (in 2 pieces), 100 wooden letter tiles, 4 tile racks, 1 plush drawstring bag and game guide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,001 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
